p.e:
CHAPTER 1: INTRO


The units of my empire
are all about efficiency.
recycling is a common
occurence, and turns
are fast because of
their efficient playstyle.

We feel at home in the
middle of the battlefield
where there is plenty of
scrap to recycle.

CHAPTER 2: BEGIN

The first thing you want
to do is getting some
precious, precious coin.
Sadly, miners are slow
and expensive. So the
first units we are going
to buy are just one
miner and one practical
gearmover.
trust me.

Load the miner on the
mover and get some G!
